cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'3 GOVERNMENT). COPY NO, CABIN 1 T. GOMPOSITIOH OF CABINET COMMITTEES. I am instructed By the Prime Minister to circulate a revised list of Cabinet Committees, shoving their present composition. The list should he substituted for that circulated as CP. 189 (36) . (Signed) M.P.A. hankey, Secretary to the Cabinet.&, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1. 9th November, 1936. .505 (55) .
